text: some amazing new mobile phone seems to
get announced about every few months but
that doesn't mean that you need to buy a
new phone that often in fact maybe what
you need is to buy a phone for your
teenager or replace the phone that you
broke maybe you just want off the new
phone rollercoaster completely if that's
the case I have some good options for
you if you're willing to sign a new
contract or add a new line don't be
afraid to look at last year's phones
they may be a whole year old but these
devices are still amazing phones like
the samsung galaxy s4 the Moto X the HTC
one m7 or the LG g2 are all free or very
cheap on contract and yes you can even
get an inexpensive iphone if you're not
looking to sign a new contract there are
also plenty of great phones that you can
buy outright for example motorola makes
a phone called the Moto G it's available
in two flavors the cheaper version only
has 3g data speeds which means that web
browsing or video streaming might be a
little bit slower the Moto G is only
available on tmobile or ATT but it's
also only a hundred and eighty dollars
with no contract there is also a 4G moto
G that has faster data speeds and it's
more like a hundred and eighty dollars
with the new contract if you want faster
data for a good price check out the
Nokia Lumia 635 now this is a good deal
it's seventy dollars with no contract
and it supports 4G and the windows phone
interface is fun easy to use and easy to
personalize you won't find as many apps
as you maybe get on Android but most
casual users aren't going to notice now
don't get me wrong the 635 is definitely
a budget phone the screen resolution is
okay the camera is also just okay but
it's a great price a cute phone and it
gets the job done the moral here is shop
carefully these are just the phone
prices that I found right now but
there's always a good deal available
don't be lured by the flashy ads and if
you don't like what you buy don't worry
I'm sure a next generation phone is
about to be announced
